description.message: Porta lo scrolling ad un livello completamente nuovo.

default_change_impossible.message: You cannot alter the default configuration! Please choose another name.

default_delete_impossible.message: You cannot delete the default configuration!

confirm_overwrite.message:
A configuration with that name already exists.
Do you want to replace it?

confirm_delete.message: Do you really want to irreversibly delete this configuration?

confirm_load.message:
Voi veramente caricare questa configurazione?
Le impostazioni correnti saranno sostituite.

color.message: Colore delle barre di scorrimento, della superbar e dei pulsanti.

color_bg.message: Colore delle barre in secondo piano

auto_coloring.message: Color UI matching the page instead if possible

size.message: Width (respectively height for horizontal bars) in normal state

hover_size.message: Width (respectively height for horizontal bars) when hovered with the mouse

gap.message: Distance to the border of the window

vbar_at_left.message: Mostra la barra di scorrimento a sinistra invece che a destra

hbar_at_top.message: Display the horizontal scroll bar at the top instead of bottom

show_when.message: When do you want the bars to show up?

normal.message: Upon hovering, while scrolling and at changes of position or size

show_bg_bars_when.message: E le barre in secondo piano?

show_how_long.message: How long do you want the bars to stay visible?

fullscreen_only.message: Mostra le barre solo in modalità schermo intero

move_bars_during_scroll.message: Animate the scroll bars during scrolling with the mouse wheel / keyboard

bg_special_ends.message: Il click alle estremità delle barre in secondo piano scorre all'inizio/fine al posto che di una pagina per volta.

container1.message: Trigger modern scroll within a distance of

style_element_bars.message: Applica lo stile a tutte le barre di scorrimento

explanation_element_bars.message: Activate this to make modern scroll also style all scrollbars within the page, e.g. those of textareas.

autohide_element_bars.message: Nascondi automaticamente le barre di scorrimento nella pagina

explanation_autohide_element_bars.message: Sfortunatamente questa impostazione non funziona affidabilmente a causa degli errori di rendering. Puoi abilitarla, ma le barre di scorrimento potrebbero non essere visualizzate correttamente

show_superbar_minipage.message: Show a mini-version of the website in the background when dragging the superbar

superbar_opacity.message: Opacità della superbar al passaggio del mouse

show_bookmarks.message: Show bookmarks within the page for scrolling to the specified locations

show_buttons.message: Mostra i pulsanti per lo scorrimento ad inizio o fine pagina.

drag_buttons.message: You can drag the buttons to any position here in the options. This position will become the default for all websites. If they cover an element on some pages, you still will be able to drag them out of the way there

show_contextmenu_when.message: When do you want an option in the context menu for hiding modern scroll?

contextmenu_over_only.message: Cliccando col tasto destro sulla interfaccia di modern scroll

use_custom_functions_middle.message: per scatto della rotellina del mouse

endMiddlescrollByTurningWheel.message: End as well by turning the mouse wheel

keyscroll_velocity.message: Velocity of scrolling via the arrow keys

mousescroll_velocity.message: Velocity of scrolling by mouse wheel and trackpad

mousescroll_distance.message: Distance scrolled per mouse wheel rotation

middlescroll_velocity.message: Velocità dello scorrimento tramite rotellina del mouse

external_interface.message: Provide an interface for external access

footer.message: Grazie per avere installato questa estensione. Mi potete contattare in ogni momento se avete domande o suggerimenti.

explanation_save_set.message:
You can save your current configuration here.
Just enter a name and click the save-button.
If you choose a name that already exists, this entry will be replaced.

explanation_move_bars_during_scroll.message:
Deactivate this option if you encounter performance problems.
The scroll bars' positions will only be updated when scrolling has finished.

explanation_superbar.message:
The "superbar" is a combination of a horizontal and a vertical scroll bar.
Thus, it only gets visible when both bars are necessary.
Its position is aligned with the vertical and horizontal scroll bars.

explanation_custom_functions.message: Standard scrolling experience is sometimes a bit jerky and slow. By activating these options the extension also takes over the corresponding scrolling, which should result in a noticeable performance boost.

explanation_animate_scroll.message:
If you select this option, the page will not instantly jump to the desired position anymore, but automatically scroll there with an adjustable rate.
This applies to the scroll buttons, clicks at the background bars as well as scrolling with the keyboard (if "Use custom scrolling functions for the keyboard" is activated).

explanation_external_interface.message:
By checking this option, modern scroll will provide some of its key features for usage by third-party-extensions, websites or you. You can then e.g. create custom mouse gestures.
Visit the documentation to learn more about it.

disabled.message: modern scroll has been disabled on $DOMAIN$

report_domain.message: If there's an issue with the page, please report it so it can get fixed for everybody.

rate.message: Dai il tuo voto a modern scroll

have_fun.message:
Have fun using the extension.
I'm gonna check in with you in a few weeks to see how you like it. 🍻

like_it.message:
Hello again!
It's been a few weeks since you installed modern scroll.
How do you like it so far?

that_is_great.message:
Awesome!
Would you mind supporting me in order to continue improving modern scroll? 🍻

im_sorry_to_hear.message:
I'm sorry to hear you're not 100% convinced yet.
If there's anything you'd like to see improved, please let me know.

continued_support.message:
I'd really appreciate your continued support in order to keep improving the extension.
If you haven't done so yet, now's a great time to start! 🍻
